import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { getExpensesPerMonth } from '../../../actions/expenses_actions' import Loader from "../../../components/Loader"; import Message from "../../../components/Message"; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function ThisMonthBill() { return (
Bill July
{/* boostrap table for all the users , room no , current bill added */}
# Name Room No Current Bill
1 Hasnain Sikandar 43 +100
2 Muzaffar Jamil 54 900+
3 Myan Bazaan 11 +400
); } export default ThisMonthBill;
